page.title: 08A BARNARD CASTLE BUILDER
page.content: I started this trade in 1920 and have been in Barnard Castle most of that time.Five people work for me and as well as erecting complete buildings, we do extensions,alterations and repairs.I cover an area of about 10 miles radius and have built six housing estates in the last 30 years. The Catholic Church in Middleton-in- Teesdale,St Mary's RC School,are both my work, but a house in Winston is the building I am most proud of. Houses now have more prefabricated roofs, insulation, central heating and double glazing. In my 65 years materials have not changed much equipment has, following the introduction of electric tools and mechanical diggers. Prices have changed a lot, a three bedroomed semi which was Â£1200 twenty years ago would now be Â£32000. Land which was Â£2000 a plot is now about Â£10000.
